name: GCControllerTouchpad
desc: A control element that represents a touch event on a touchpad.

items.name: var touchSurface: GCControllerDirectionPad
items.desc: The element that represents the state of the user’s touch on the surface of the touchpad.

items.name: var button: GCControllerButtonInput
items.desc: The element that represents the button component on the touchpad.

items.name: var touchState: GCControllerTouchpad.TouchState
items.desc: The state of the user’s touch on the surface of the touchpad.

items.name: enum GCControllerTouchpad.TouchState
items.desc: The possible states of the user’s touch.

items.name: var reportsAbsoluteTouchSurfaceValues: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the touch values are absolute or relative.

items.name: var touchDown: GCControllerTouchpadHandler?
items.desc: The block that the element calls when the user begins touching the touchpad.

items.name: var touchMoved: GCControllerTouchpadHandler?
items.desc: The block that the element calls when the user continues touching the touchpad, not when the user begins or ends touching the touchpad.

items.name: var touchUp: GCControllerTouchpadHandler?
items.desc: The block that the element calls when the user finishes touching the touchpad.

items.name: typealias GCControllerTouchpadHandler
items.desc: The signature for the block that executes when the user interacts with the touchpad.

items.name: func setValueForXAxis(Float, yAxis: Float, touchDown: Bool, buttonValue: Float)
items.desc: Sets the input values of a snapshot of a touchpad.
